thread.section_title: AMIClubwear.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of AMIClubwear.com | www.amiclubwear.com | 9 of 786
thread.title: Yolanda

author: Yolanda
title: Yolanda
text: I wish I had checked the reviews. I recently ordered something and the quality was poor and did not fit as stated. I received and RMA # as instructed and return the order and it has been delivered for more than their allotted 10-15 days and no one will now respond to any emails that I send. They will not answer the phone. You stay on hold for over 30 minutes then a recording comes on and say due to high call volume you will be disconnected!!! Sucks!!! Will never order again if I get the store credit they promised since they do no do refunds
